meanings.definition: The act of making something more attractive or beautiful.
meanings.sent1: The prettification of the garden with colorful flowers brought joy to everyone.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the prettification of her room with new curtains and cushions.
meanings.sent3: The prettification of the plain cake with vibrant icing made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the prettification of a gloomy day, brightening everything around her.
meanings.sent5: The prettification of the old building with fresh paint revived its charm and elegance.

meanings.definition: The process of enhancing the appearance of something.
meanings.sent1: The prettification of the website with new graphics improved user experience.
meanings.sent2: He specialized in the prettification of antique furniture, restoring them to their former glory.
meanings.sent3: The prettification of his car with racing stripes made it look faster than it actually was.
meanings.sent4: Her makeup was the prettification that transformed her into a glamorous movie star.
meanings.sent5: The prettification of the park with fairy lights created a magical atmosphere for the evening event.
